Name: Saint Emiliana
About the game: Emiliana lives a simple life as a nun in the remote village of Zamak. One day, Mariethas soldiers appear in the village's market on a Witch Hunt. There they capture Emiliana's sister, Laura, accusing her of being a Witch. In order to save her sister, Emiliana exchanges her soul for the power of a Witch. Now, Emiliana must wrestle with her faith as she searches for her sister. Features: Classic RPG Experience Fantasy Setting Turn-based Combat Leveling System Quest System 'Demon Flame' System
